channel.title: Posts on Alon
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alon

item.title: Life is not as easy as you think
item.description: After I came to shanghai, I made a lot of friends. In my impression, students that are able to be admitted to Shanghai Jiaotong university are either talented or diligent.

item.title: Prokka: prokaryotic genome annotation
item.description: Prokka is a fast and accurate prokaryotic genome annotation system under UNIX platform.

item.title: BLAST: build your own blast on your laptop
item.description:
Basic Local Alignment Search Tool (BLAST) is one of the most commonly used bioinformatic software for researchers in the filed of biology and medicine.
It is very useful to find homology of a specific sequence, be it AA(amino acid) or NT(nucliotide) sequence.
However, most of the users don’t know that BLAST can be installed under their personal computer.

item.title: Bioconda: A package management center for Linux
item.description:
For greenhands in bioinformatics, the biggest challenge is to install bioinformatic software in the Linux system.
Here comes bioconda, a software that resolve most of the difficulty for beginners when dealing with bioinformatic software.

item.title: Hello Shanghai
item.description: Since 2018/08/15, I have been in Shanghai for 45 Days. Some thoughts in my mind are begining to change.
